Uses of Package
org.mapsforge.android.maps

Packages that use org.mapsforge.android.maps
org.mapsforge.android.maps The mapsforge-map library allows applications to render and display a map without Internet connection. 
org.mapsforge.android.maps.inputhandling   
org.mapsforge.android.maps.mapgenerator   
org.mapsforge.android.maps.overlay   
 

Classes in org.mapsforge.android.maps used by org.mapsforge.android.maps
DebugSettings
          A simple DTO to stores flags for debugging rendered map tiles.
FpsCounter
          An FPS counter measures the frame rate at which a MapView is drawn.
FrameBuffer
          A FrameBuffer uses two separate memory buffers to display the current and build up the next frame.
MapController
          A MapController is used to programmatically modify the position and zoom level of a MapView.
MapScaleBar
          A MapScaleBar displays the ratio of a distance on the map to the corresponding distance on the ground.
MapScaleBar.TextField
          Enumeration of all text fields.
MapViewPosition
          A MapPosition stores the latitude and longitude coordinate of a MapView together with its zoom level.
MapZoomControls
          A MapZoomControls instance displays buttons for zooming in and out in a map.
Projection
          A Projection translates between the pixel coordinate system on the screen and geographical points on the earth.
 

Classes in org.mapsforge.android.maps used by org.mapsforge.android.maps.inputhandling
MapView
          A MapView shows a map on the display of the device.
PausableThread
          An abstract base class for threads which support pausing and resuming.
 

Classes in org.mapsforge.android.maps used by org.mapsforge.android.maps.mapgenerator
DebugSettings
          A simple DTO to stores flags for debugging rendered map tiles.
MapView
          A MapView shows a map on the display of the device.
PausableThread
          An abstract base class for threads which support pausing and resuming.

          A MapView shows a map on the display of the device.
